panels.description:
- Limit is physical RAM on the node
- "hostname" is RAM usage as reported by host OS
- App RAM is RAM usage as reported by clustermonitor (kubernetes)
panels.title: Memory utilization over time (${nodes:regex})

panels.description:
- Limit is physical RAM on the node
- "hostname" is CPU usage as reported by host OS
- App CPU is CPU usage as reported by clustermonitor (kubernetes)
- IOWait is CPU usage as reported by Host OS
panels.title: CPU utilization over time (${nodes:regex})
